thread.title: WATCH: Star Lord meets dad in final ‘Guardians of Galaxy 2′ trailer
thread.title_full: WATCH: Star Lord meets dad in final ‘Guardians of Galaxy 2′ trailer

title: WATCH: Star Lord meets dad in final ‘Guardians of Galaxy 2′ trailer
text:
WATCH: Star Lord meets dad in final ‘Guardians of Galaxy 2′ trailer INQUIRER.net / 05:35 PM March 01, 2017 The surprises just keep on coming, as the much-anticipated sequel of Marvel’s “Guardian of the Galaxy” dropped its final trailer on Jimmy Kimmel Live on Tuesday (Wednesday in Manila). Just two months away from it’s worldwide release, the galaxy’s favorite band of misfit heroes once again displayed their brand of “beautiful destruction” through never-before-seen footage of their upcoming blockbuster. ADVERTISEMENT Star-Lord (Chris Pratt), Gamora (Zoe Saldana), Drax the Destroyer (Dave Bautista), Rocket Raccoon (Bradley Cooper) and Baby Groot (Vin Diesel) all share ample screen time as they fend off their latest intergalactic adversaries. Joining in the fray are former foes Yondu (Michael Rooker) and Nebula (Karen Gillan), along with the beamy-eyed Mantis (Pom Klementieff). The biggest reveal, meanwhile, came in the form of a bearded Kurt Russel, who left Pratt’s character in shock, after divulging he was his long-lost father. Director James Gunn, who made the original film, returns to direct the sequel and even shared the film’s latest promotional poster on Twitter. Because we love you. New #GotGVol2 poster. pic.twitter.com/tWWOT4T9Xh 
— James Gunn (@JamesGunn) March 1, 2017 By the looks of it, the film is looking to replicate the success of the first film through its unique blend of dry humor and jaw-dropping action. “Guardians of the Galaxy, Vol. 2″ hits theaters on May 5th. Khristian Ibarrola /ra
